Package architecture.augmentations.equipment

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Armor
    Represents armor worn by the Player.
    Chest
    A container for items which can be looted by the player.
    Equipment
    A class to describe general equipment.
    Weapon
    A class to represent weapons.
